## ThirdwebSDK.getModules() method

Call this to get the current apps.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getModules(address: string, filterByModuleType?: ModuleType[]): Promise<ModuleMetadata<ContractMetadataSchema>[]>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
